verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
War, we shall war,
We shall war against the lie of Babylon,
War, we shall war,
We shall war against the lie of Babylon.
And rejoice as she crumbles,
And sing as she dies,
War, we shall war,
We shall war against the lie of Babylon.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fight, we shall fight,
We shall fight with the weapons of righteousness,
Fight, we shall fight,
We shall fight with the weapons of righteousness.
For our weapons are not carnal,
But mighty by the power of God,
Fight, we shall fight,
We shall fight with the weapons of righteousness.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Win, we shall win,
We shall win the battle of the ages,
Win, we shall win,
We shall win the battle of the ages,
We'll march as more than conquerors,
And rule from His throne,
Win, we shall win,
We shall win the battle of the ages.
